subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: With eight races left until the start of Nascar’s Chase for the Sprint Cup, it is a nervous time for some drivers who are on the outside but still in reach of a spot in the postseason.
snippet: With eight races left until the start of Nascar’s Chase for the Sprint Cup, it is a nervous time for some drivers who are on the outside but still in reach of a spot in the postseason.
